Message:
Above the dried lake was
a seemingly wounded...fairy?
Or so it appeared...

The ball of light weakly bobbed
in the air as if it were alive.

What a strange light...
But...I cannot help but feel
a strange sense of fear
when I look at it...

Though I know not why
the sight of it makes me
feel that way...

“Let me tell you how to
save your village, my dear...”

In that moment,
the voice of the fairy
entered my mind.
But...how could I possibly
save the village...?

“For a special girl like you
who can hear my voice,
it is possible.”

“Allow me to awaken
the power sleeping within you...”
